TopicTitle: Can't Launch a ship from Launchpad. Can Only Launch from VAB.

Articles.Content:
When I try to launch a ship with the launchpad, I am offered a selection of ships and and possible crews but when I chose to launch, the window disappears and clicking on the launchpad does nothing. I can however, open the VAB or other buildings after this has occurred.

To be honest, this wouldn't bother me except when I launch a ship through the VAB, it ignores my crew choice, loading only the crew I chose for my primary command pod. I used to get around this problem by launching from the Launchpad instead.
Please read and follow the instructions in this sticky thread and update your post with the required format and information.
